hibernate-mapping.query: from ContaPagar where (:tipoCusto is null or tipoCusto = :tipoCusto) and (:tipoContaPagar is null or tipo = :tipoContaPagar) and (:statusContaPagar is null or status = :statusContaPagar) and (:centroCusto is null or centroCusto = :centroCusto) and (:dataInicial is null or mesCompetencia >= :dataInicial) and (:dataFinal is null or mesCompetencia <= :dataFinal) and ( ((:geral is null or :geral = false) and colaborador is not null) or (:geral = true and colaborador is null) ) order by dataPagamento desc, valor

from ContaPagar where (:dataInicial is null or mesCompetencia >= :dataInicial) and (:dataFinal is null or mesCompetencia <= :dataFinal) and ( (:colaborador is null and colaborador is not null) or (:colaborador is not null and colaborador = :colaborador) ) order by dataPagamento desc, valor

select sum(valor) from ContaPagar where (:tipoCusto is null or tipoCusto = :tipoCusto) and (:dataInicial is null or mesCompetencia >= :dataInicial) and (:dataFinal is null or mesCompetencia <= :dataFinal)
select sum(valor) from ContaPagar where centroCusto = :centro and (:dataInicial is null or mesCompetencia >= :dataInicial) and (:dataFinal is null or mesCompetencia <= :dataFinal)
select sum(valor) from ContaPagar where (:tipo is null or tipo = :tipo) and (:dataInicial is null or mesCompetencia >= :dataInicial) and (:dataFinal is null or mesCompetencia <= :dataFinal)
